response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, I am confident it would be worth more than $8,000 to you. Considering its true worth and the opportunity it presents, I am offering it to you for $10,000. This price reflects a fair compromise between its value to you and my expectations for the sale. Please let me know if this offer meets your considerations, and we can proceed with the transaction. Thank you for your time and interest.", "product_price": 10000}
